sentences: Ma eeldan, et ta tuleb homme.
Ta ei eelda muld head vastust.
Meie eeldame, et projekt saab valmis nädalapääeval.
context: The Estonian word 'eeldan' is the first person singular present tense form of the verb 'elda', meaning to assume, suppose, or presume. It is commonly used when expressing a belief about something that may not be certain yet. The verb belongs to the -da conjugation group in Estonian.
